alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 29 at 3:14AM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with damaging gusts to 60 mph are expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Western San Fernando Valley and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In the San Fernando Valley, winds will be strongest in northern and western portions, while in the valleys of Ventura County, winds will be strongest in eastern portions.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain indoors and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley
